Spell.Name: Fire_Blast
Spell.Description: Blast the enemy with fire dealing damage. This spell is stronger against targets that are already burning.

Spell.Name: Ignite
Spell.Description: Sets the target ablaze dealing periodic damage.

Spell.Name: Flames of Life
Spell.Description: Extinguish the flames on a hostile target and heal for the remaining damage.

Spell.Name: Flame Star
Spell.Description: Spew flames all around the pyromancer.

Spell.Name: Molten Rock
Spell.Description: Throw a molten rock at a group of enemies dealing damage to them. A primary target will take increased damage.

Spell.Name: Draw Lava
Spell.Description: Draw lava from the ground and enchance you melee weapon.

Spell.Name: Lava Cannon
Spell.Description: Shoot 2-5 lava bolts from your hand each dealing damage.

Spell.Name: Volcanic Activity
Spell.Description: Summon a volcano from the ground that spews lava and deals fire damage to nearby targets.

Spell.Name: Flaming Feathers
Spell.Description: Shoot flaming feather from your hand dealing damage to enemies in front of you.

Spell.Name: Blazing Flight
Spell.Description: Cover yourself in flames and rush forward dealing damage to all enemies in the path.

Spell.Name: Summon Phoenix
Spell.Description: Summon a phoenix to aid you in combat. The phoenix will shoot firebolts at enemies that deals damage and heals you.

Spell.Name: Steam Blast
Spell.Description: Spew out steam in front of you dealing damage to enemies.

Spell.Name: Quicksand
Spell.Description: Summon quicksand from the ground to slow all enemies who tries to pass it.

Spell.Name: Rock Shower
Spell.Description: Pull dirt and rocks from the ground and blast it in all directions.

Spell.Name: N/A
Spell.Description: Some healing-spell.

Spell.Name: Water Bolt
Spell.Description: Shoot a water bolt towards a single enemy.

Spell.Name: Hydro Pump
Spell.Description: Pump water in front of you dealing damage and knocking enemies back.

Spell.Name: Refresh
Spell.Description: Heal yourself with a refreshing splash of water. Also increases damage dealt for a short period of time.

Spell.Name: Bubble
Spell.Description: Summons a bubble around an enemy that hinders their movement. This spell pulls flying targets to the ground.

Spell.Name: Ice Bolt
Spell.Description: Shoot an ice bolt towards a single enemy, which deals damage and slows their movement speed.

Spell.Name: Blizzard
Spell.Description: Summon a blizzard around you that deals damage to enemies. The damage increases, if the target is already frozen.

Spell.Name: Ice Coat
Spell.Description: Cover yourself in a coat of ice, that prevents you from taking damage, but also stops your mana from regenerating.

Spell.Name: Break Ice
Spell.Description: Breaks the ice of a friend or foe. If used when Ice Coat is active it will create an explosion around you, that deals a high ammount of damage. If used on a frozen target it will create an explosion, that deals small damage and freezes all targets around the enemy.

Spell.Name: Drain Life
Spell.Description: Drain life from an enemy to heal you.

Spell.Name: Summon Dead
Spell.Description: Summon a skeleton to aid you in combat. The skeleton lives for a short time before it returns to its grave.

Spell.Name: Scream of Death
Spell.Description: Let loose a scream to scare your enemies. This decreases their damage for a period of time.

Spell.Name: Bone Boomerang
Spell.Description: Throw a bone boomerang that deals damage to enemies.

Spell.Name: Void Trap
Spell.Description: Create a trap that deals damage and stuns all enemies that walks over it.

Spell.Name: Chaos Disc
Spell.Description: Throw a disc of chaos that damages all enemies and heals you for a portion of the damage dealt.

Spell.Name: Mind Control
Spell.Description: Control the mind of an enemy causing them to turn on his allies and aid you.

Spell.Name: Rift
Spell.Description: Summon a rift nearby that drains life-force from enemies and pulls them towards the rift.

Spell.Name: Bolt of Light
Spell.Description: Shoot a bolt of light towards the enemy.

Spell.Name: Prayer
Spell.Description: Create a ward that regenerates a small portion of health each second. (Also glows a bit)

Spell.Name: Condemn
Spell.Description: Condemn enemies with their sins, stunning them and has a small change of turning an enemy against his allies.

Spell.Name: Holy Radiance
Spell.Description: Shine with holy light, decreasing damage taken and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
